short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow formatting on Playground with regex

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to use Regular expressions in the OpenAi playground website. You can add multiple expressions which all format the text at the same time. After applying the regex you can copy the output text and paste it into the playground.
